name: ASCENT: Crash Landing
description: ASCENT: Crash Landing is an open world 3D platforming beta, heavily inspired by classic platformers such as Crash Bandicoot, Rayman, Croc & Spyro.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-7300Q CPU @ 2.50GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Intel Display Audio Additional Notes: Best experienced using a controller.
